channel.title: Teleports
channel.description:
Ok so im trying to make it where teleports such as cammy will pop up with a dialogue for bosses/training/city's where i can choose where to tele to.
Example- Cammy tele is for bosses. I click it dialogue pops up and shows a bunch of bosses i can tele to.
Any help?

item.title: Teleports
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Make dialogue in DialogueHandler and get the button id and make a case for it in ClickingButtons. For however many teleports you make (maximum of 4 per dialogue), you’ll have to edit the cases 9178-9181 to make the actual teleports work. This is something very simple though, you should have no problem with it with some Java knowledge.

Read full topic
